semantic_identifier: [GOLD-149]: Add domain-vocabulary signals to clustering to reduce false merges
title: Add domain-vocabulary signals to clustering to reduce false merges

sections.text: Clustering quality varies across domains because the model overweights generic terms and misses domain-specific vocabulary, leading to false merges. Introduce domain-aware text features (e.g., domain keyword lists, ID/sku/code detection, and stopword overrides) and incorporate them into similarity scoring so clusters only merge when domain-specific signals align. Add configuration to enable/disable these signals per integration/source (e.g., Zendesk vs. Intercom) to avoid regressions.
